actions.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment excludes from the proposed moratorium on regulatory rulemaking those agency actions which are required by the Uruguay Round trade agreement.
purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of February 22, 1995) to exclude from the bill's proposed moratorium on regulatory rulemaking those agency actions which are required by the Uruguay Round trade agreement.
